descriptionHtml:
------------------------------------------------------------Story------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod adds a gleaming set of armour , forged from the great \"Onyx Abyss\" forgery. The great \"Onyx Dragon\" was sent from the abyss to wreck havack on Skyrim. The dragon , long dead was still holding a secret though , for years travellers ventured to find the secret but only when they sliced the dragon open did they find a chest , shining with glory , they opended the chest and found armour , but not any armour it was \"Abyss Forge\" armour and through the years many men and women wore the armour with pride and joy and now it has been passed onto you , wear it with pride as they would have years ago.

---------------------------------------------------------Instructions------------------------------------------------------------

Find glass armour ( Gauntlets , Chest Plate , Boots , Helmet ) or obtain it through the console commands. After this you will have my re-textured armor , it is quite amazing and looks very rare and special. Wear it with pride!

------------------------------------------------------------Note-------------------------------------------------------------------

Some users have said the armor is brown but i can asure you it is onyx , the first picture was horrible and new pictures have been added , have a good day/night!

------------------------------How to get the glass armor through the console------------------------------------

Step 1. Hit the \"~\" button
Step 2. Type \"Player.additem 0001393A\"
Step 3. Then Type \"Player.additem 0001393B\"
Step 4. Next Up Type \"Player.additem 00013938\"
Step 5. Type \"Player.additem 00013939\"
Step 6. Bask in the glory of the sexey armor!

-------------------------------------------------------Conclusion--------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks guys for downloading , i hope you have a great time and be on the look out for me and my armor/weapon retextures. When the CK comes out i will excel forward and mod with more precision. But as for now i am sorry the mod is only for Males , if i get some comments asking for female i will make it ASAP.

--------------------------------------------------Shout Out---------------------------------------------------------------------

Only one shout out and thats to one of mah besties , chloe for always been there for mee :L
author: Maxpower439
